text_logic_form: The length of the line $KN$ is $9$ units.
The length of the line $LN$ is $16$ units.
The length of the line $PM$ is twice the length of the line $PK$.
Find the length of the line $PK$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The length of the line $KN$ is $9$ units.
The length of the line $LN$ is $16$ units.
The length of the line $PM$ is twice the length of the line $PK$.
Find the length of the line $PK$.
diagram_logic_form: Point $Q$ lies on the line connecting $P$ and $R$.
Point $R$ lies on the line connecting $M$ and $L$.
Point $Q$ lies on the line connecting $M$ and $N$.
Point $P$ lies on the line connecting $M$ and $K$.
Point $N$ lies on the line connecting $K$ and $L$.
The line connecting $K$ and $N$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $Q$ and $N$.
The line connecting $M$ and $R$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $P$ and $M$.
line_instances: There are lines $PM$, $PK$, $PR$, and $PQ$, forming a quadrilateral $MPQR$.
There are lines $ML$, $MN$, $MK$, and $MR$, forming a quadrilateral $MLNR$.
There are lines $MQ$, $KL$, $KN$, and $RL$, forming a quadrilateral $MKLR$.
The lines $PM$ and $RL$ are the diagonals of the quadrilateral $MPRL$.
